title: Reaction From Ferguson; The Rise of Homeless Children
teaser: The St. Louis County prosecutor announced a grand jury's decision not to indict officer Darren Wilson in the shooting death of Michael Brown. We get a reaction from a St. Louis-based reporter who has been tracking this story. Plus, a new report shows that one in 30 children in America have experienced homelessness. That's up about 8-percent from last year. Dr. Carmela DeCandia of The National Center On Family Homelessness will discuss that, and other findings from the study.
